name: Slice & Dice (DerpiestDude)
description:
You are a chef, but every other order you fulfill something random gets added! Try to make it to the end!

IF YOU ARE PLAYING ON BROWSER, GO FULLSCREEN TO SEE EVERYTHING

RECIPES

Fries - Chop up potatoes then cook them

Burger - Cook a raw beef patty then put it in the combiner (with the purple center) with a piece of bread

Drink - Grab a cup and put in in the drink machine

CONTROLS

WASD / Arrow Keys - Movement

Face Mouse

Left Click - Interact

------------------------

Music / SFX - Crawd

Programming / Art - DerpiestDude
